author: Ellen Ormesher
description:
More than 30 medical organisations representing 12 million health professionals worldwide have pledged to boycott advertising and public relations agencies that work with the fossil fuel industry, citing the impacts of the climate crisis on human health. “Health organisations have great power that they can bring to bear in their hiring of advertising, marketing, and design […]

The post Health Groups Shun Advertising Agencies Working for Fossil Fuel Companies appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Health Groups Shun Advertising Agencies Working for Fossil Fuel Companies

author: Hazel Healy and Brigitte Wear
description:
Waitrose, Co-op, Lidl, Asda and Aldi among retailers selling fish fed on west African catch

title: Revealed: UK Supermarket Seabass Linked to Devastating Overfishing in Senegal
